sentence.Network_en: All of a sudden a tall old man in a black cloak loomed out of the murk.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位身着黑斗篷的高个儿老者突然从暗处闪了出来。

sentence.Network_en: Longing for full knowledge, one must chart route through the murk of unknowing.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时由于渴望取得全面了解, 还必须在一片无知的混沌之中开出一条路子来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “黑暗”用英文怎么说？ - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... 不好：0 dark 黑暗 dark;darkness;murk;gloom.
muriphobia 鼠科学murk 暗的murkily 黝暗地
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... funk（ 恶臭的）； murk（ 黑暗的）； dark（ 黑的，黑暗的）；.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mirce, of Germanic origin; reinforced in Middle English by Old Norse myrkr

entry.def: The murk is darkness, dark water, or thick mist that is very difficult to see through.

example.ex: All of a sudden a tall old man in a black cloak loomed out of the murk.
example.tran: 一位身着黑斗篷的高个儿老者突然从暗处闪了出来。

means.word_mean: 1. an atmosphere in which visibility is reduced because of a cloud of some substance
